resources.string: Dear, this app keep you driving more safe, please try it at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=%1$s
Im Driving depends on notification service, please enable it.
Welcome to safe driving, have a good journey.
The title is %1$s and the content is %2$s
Say yes to read or say no to ignore.
Sorry, I cannot hear clearly, could you speak again. Say yes to read or say no to ignore
The short message is from %1$s and the content is %2$s
You got new short message from %1$s
Do you want to reply, say yes to reply or say no to ignore.
Sorry, I cannot hear clearly. Could you say your reply message again.
Say yes to send the message or say no to discard.
Sorry, I cannot hear clearly. Say yes to send your message or say no to discard.
Sorry the reply message is empty, please say your message again.
The message about to send is %1$s.
I am about aborting since hearing the command %1$s
Sorry, too many failed trials, bye.

We need your help to translate our app to your language to secure more people driving safely. We will refund the first 50 people who buy this app from your country after your translation. We plan to support following languages: Dutch, French, German, Italian, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish.
You can use 1 hour after 7 days try, please buy unlimited version. Thanks for your support.
